```{=html}
<script>
// Make the custom X button clickable
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Add click event to the navbar-collapse when it's shown
  const navbarCollapse = document.querySelector('.navbar-collapse');
  const navbarToggler = document.querySelector('.navbar-toggler');
  
  if (navbarCollapse && navbarToggler) {
    navbarCollapse.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      // Check if the click is on the X button (top-left area)
      const rect = navbarCollapse.getBoundingClientRect();
      const clickX = e.clientX - rect.left;
      const clickY = e.clientY - rect.top;
      
      // If click is in the top-left area (where X is positioned)
      if (clickX <= 60 && clickY <= 60) {
        // Trigger the navbar toggler to close the menu
        navbarToggler.click();
      }
    });
  }
});
</script>
```
